Trade/Device Name(s): SmartestTM Glucowise Blood Glucose Monitoring System, Model 6267-S
SmartestTM Glucowise MULTI Blood Glucose Monitoring System, Model 6267-M
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): SmartestTM Glucowise MULTI Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Smartest Glucowise Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems Model 6267-S and 6267-M for quantitative glucose measurement in fresh capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips or forearm, intended for single-patient home use (Model 6267-S) and multiple-patient professional healthcare use (Model 6267-M) as an aid in monitoring diabetes control, not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
